ModMetaData.name: Compact Hediffs
ModMetaData.author: PeteTimesSix
ModMetaData.description: Alters the health tab hediff listing to be slightly less ugly and slightly more customisable. Features - Customisability - Body part replacement names (ex: peg legs, archotech eyes, Pawnmorpher morphs) get folded into the body part's name - Multiple icons for various severities of bleeding and tending quality - Merging hediffs by type rather than by label, treated and untreated hediffs share same entry - One icon per wound instead of vanilla's averaged single icon - Sorting hediffs for body part by severity - Per-body part health bars - Severity/Immunity progress bars - Expandable health tab size (yes, I am aware of the irony of a mod called Compact Hediffs making the tab larger) -------------------- More to come ...?
